name: ExLattice
description: For additive manufacturing users that have time-consuming build preparation and setup challenges, we provide software that can generate real-time physics-based analytics and simulation-driven setup solutions that make precision and speed a reality.
one_liner: For additive manufacturing users that have time-consuming build preparation and setup challenges, we provide software that can generate real-time physics-based analytics and simulation-driven setup solutions that make precision and speed a reality.
